## ChunkLattice.getOrCreateChunk() method

Get the chunk for a given global coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOrCreateChunk(globalCoordinate: Vector3Like): Chunk;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

The global coordinate of the chunk to get.

**Returns:**

[Chunk](./server.chunk.md)
